price: ߒߠߋ ߛߌߟߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߟߏ߲ߓߊ ߘߏ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
